```{r Amandas Graph}
library(ggplot2)
library(gapminder)
library(raster)
library(rgdal)
ggplot(data=gapminder,aes(x=year,y=lifeExp))+geom_point()
```

```{r}
HARV <- raster("data/HARV_dsmCrop.tif")
HARV_df <- as.data.frame(HARV,xy=TRUE)
ggplot()+geom_raster(data=HARV_df,aes(x=x,y=y,fill=HARV_dsmCrop))+scale_fill_viridis_c()+coord_quickmap()
```
